settings.showEmoteInOverlayThreshold: Minimal message threshold to show emote in overlay

hideEmoteInOverlayAfter.title: Hide emote in overlay after inactivity
hideEmoteInOverlayAfter.help: Will hide emote in overlay after certain time in seconds

comboMessageMinThreshold.title: Minimal message threshold
comboMessageMinThreshold.help: Minimal message threshold to count emotes as combo (until then won't trigger cooldown)

hype.5: Let's go! We got $amountx $emote combo so far! SeemsGood
hype.15: Keep it going! Can we get more than $amountx $emote? TriHard
